description: Loading skeleton for project dashboard page with KPI cards, charts, and table placeholders

dataContract.note: Pure presentation component - no data dependencies

behavioralAssertions.requirement: Component MUST render skeleton placeholders for all dashboard sections
behavioralAssertions.validation: Unit test: verify header, filter panel, KPI cards, charts, and table sections rendered

behavioralAssertions.requirement: KPI cards section MUST render exactly 6 skeleton cards
behavioralAssertions.validation: Unit test: query all KPI card skeletons, verify count === 6

behavioralAssertions.requirement: Charts section MUST render 3 chart skeletons (2 side-by-side + 1 burn rate)
behavioralAssertions.validation: Unit test: verify 3 chart placeholder cards with 300px height

behavioralAssertions.requirement: Table skeleton MUST render with header and 5 data rows
behavioralAssertions.validation: Unit test: verify table header exists and 5 row skeletons rendered
